Simulation.masters: Select the master from the dropdown.
Simulation.technology: Select the technology from the dropdown.
Simulation.association: Select association for BOP from the dropdown.
Simulation.vendor: After selecting technology select vendor from the dropdown.
Simulation.globalSearch: Search for specific data from here.
Simulation.floatingFilterInput: You can search for specific column-wise data here.
Simulation.floatingFilterButton: Filter the data based on different conditions here.
Simulation.filter: After entering specific data, click here to filter it.
Simulation.refresh: Refresh the grid to update filtered data from here.
Simulation.checkbox: Select the checkbox to perform upload, edit, or download operations. You can choose either a single input field or all fields.
Simulation.edit: After selecting the checkbox, you can edit the simulation from here.
Simulation.download: Download the entire master table or a specific master in Excel format from here.
Simulation.date: Select the effective date from the dropdown.
Simulation.verify: Click here to verify the simulation.
Simulation.back: Click here to go back to the previous page.
Simulation.run_Simulation: Click here to run the simulation.
Simulation.sendForApproval: After selecting the checkbox, you can send it for approval.
Simulation.verifyImpact: Click here to verify the impact on the cost.
Simulation.simulationHistory: View the simulation history from here.
Simulation.simulation_Checkbox: Click on the checkbox to apply applicability.
Simulation.applicability: Select the applicability from the dropdown.

SendForApproval.approvalType: Select the approval type from the dropdown.
SendForApproval.reason: Select the reason for approval from the dropdown.
SendForApproval.decimal-option: Select the decimal option from the dropdown.
SendForApproval.submit: Click here to submit the form.

simulationApproval.searchInput: Search for specific data from here.
simulationApproval.filterButton: After entering specific data, click here to filter it out.
simulationApproval.refreshButton: Refresh the grid to update filtered data from here.
simulationApproval.floating_FilterInput: Here you can search for specific column-wise data.
simulationApproval.floating_FilterButton: Here you can filter the data based on different conditions.
simulationApproval.checkBoxButton: Click on the checkbox to select a particular row.
simulationApproval.simulation_Summary: Click on the token number to view approval summary from here.
simulationApproval.sendForApproval: After selecting the checkbox, you can send it for approval.
simulationApproval.status: You can filter the simulation by status from here.
simulationApproval.delete: You can delete the simulation from here.
simulationApproval.edit: Click here to edit the data from here.
